website_summaries.verdict: An easy to take softgel option that gets you your RDA efficiently.
pros: Get your recommended daily allowance with just one tablet daily
This product contains no artificial flavors, colors, preservatives, yeast, starch, gluten, or dairy
cons: Lower potency per tablet (although still meets Daily Recommended Allowance), and slightly higher price per tablet than other manufacturers

customer_reviews.title: Product smelled strongly of sweaty socks.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for several years and today received a new 350 count bottle. This was the first time that it smelled bad. It wasn't expired, but something was definitely wrong with it so I returned it. I guess I'll try buying my next D3 locally, as this was not up to the usual good quality of Nature's Bounty products.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Denizen

customer_reviews.title: Stinky Vitamin D
customer_reviews.text: Received the Vit D today & they stink sooooo terribly bad. The softgels were all clumped together & were disgusting. I've taken Vit D for years & never had them to smell so bad
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Parton

customer_reviews.title: Nowhere near 350 pills
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because it was a well recognized brand and my wife uses it.When it came yesterday and I looked at it there was obviously no more than 125-150 pills..not the 350 that was advertised on Amazons website and on the bottle..so I returned it today and ordered another brand. Hopefully, it"ll be as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: tennisplr

customer_reviews.title: Had bad smell like they were rancid
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking these for years. This bottle reeked when I opened it. I was sick so I guess I missed the return window. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: toonces meyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These guys are super tiny and so easy to take. I like that one bottle is almost and entire years worth, well if you take one a day. Will purchase again...in a year.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bylsma

customer_reviews.title: Gel tabs
customer_reviews.text: Gel tabs were received as a huge ball as the tabs melted together. Consider better packaging when dealing with gel tabs.
customer_reviews.author: F A AHUMADA

customer_reviews.title: Pills for avoiding osteoporosis. Inevitably
customer_reviews.text: Do you like popping pills? Do you like having bones that don't crack? Well, this is the product for you. It's like being in a 90s dance club without the highs but with the sensible knowledge that you're preventing osteoporosis. Except you're not listening to The Prodigy anymore. It's what your life is for. This. Vitamin D pills.
customer_reviews.author: CEF

customer_reviews.title: Pasted together!
customer_reviews.text: The gel vitamin pills came as a solid block. Had to use a screwdriver to get them out of the bottle. Finally did. Guess they are ok. But, it was a pain.
customer_reviews.author: redhead

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money - vitamin D3
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because My vitamin D levels were low. The pills are tiny. The absorb into the bloodstream well. My levels are almost normal.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy&Pearls

customer_reviews.title: A tiny soft gel pill that delivers the Vitamin D3!
customer_reviews.text: Great price for 350 soft gel pills. Small, tasteless, great price. It helps me get sunshine goodness without being in the sun and getting burned. I buy these all the time!
customer_reviews.author: vick

customer_reviews.title: Rotten, rancid, and gelcaps melded together
customer_reviews.text: These smell expired. I opened the bottle and my partner, in the other, asked if I had forgotten to take out the garbage because they smelled so badly. Half the pills in the bottle were smashed and burst together, the other half were melded into a gooey ball, with maybe 10 or 20 pills rattling around. Do not buy. Trying to return this and Amazon is asking for the unopened bottle to be returned.... what?? A. V. O. I. D.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Immune Booster
customer_reviews.text: Apparently, this helps boost your immune system to help fight off Covid-19 from what I have read. Can’t say how well it works as I haven’t been infected but as the saying goes an ounce of prevention is worth a pound of cure so I will continue to use for peace of mind. Great supplement to take if you aren't able to get enough sunlight during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Eric R.

customer_reviews.title: Pills stuck together and super Bad Smell
customer_reviews.text: I am sure the product is good. But all pills are stuck together and smells like rotten meat. My guess is cause of heat. As we supposed to keep medication in cool area, I am returning it back. Cause of heat pills most likely be ineffective or might not be good for health.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Mood elevator.
customer_reviews.text: Use a lot during winter months when sunshine days aren't as numerous. Helps to combat depression.

customer_reviews.title: Great product

I was having a lot of bone/chin pain where I broke my leg 8 years ago. It never really would go away. So I went to my ortho and he suggested I take a vitamin d supplement. I...

customer_reviews.title: Just make sure the product is good!
customer_reviews.text: Overall I have always liked this brand. The only issue I had was when the first order arrived and all of the pills were in a big clump as if they had melted and sealed together. It made me a bit leery, so I exchanged for a new bottle. Other than that I'm happy with my purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Actually Helps!

If you are having trouble with your D vitamin levels this does help. I've had checkups and with Natures bounty my levels did indeed rise. So it's doing SOMETHING!

customer_reviews.title: Rancid smell. Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: The content has a bad smell, rancid, similar to a rotten animal. The bottle was not open and the label displays EXP 6/23 which I guess means June 2023, so it is still supposed to be good. The content (softgel) is bundled together. Don't buy, it is a waste of your money. Select instead a product that does not contain Soybean oil. I later purchased the NatureWise brand, made of olive oil and containing a desiccant, no bad smell.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Economical. Quantity. Quality.
customer_reviews.text: I like the price for quantity. Very easy to swallow.

customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended this brand by name. The pills tend to stick to each other in the container, but they're easy to jog loose by shaking the container or brushing them with a fingertip.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I received one big blob of pills! I was out and need this so I had to dig them out with a spoon and separate them by hand..just wonder about the potency now...never again, I will just haunt wal mart until they have them

customer_reviews.title: Good vitamin manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: I feel I got the benefit I was looking for. I'm not a fan of taking supplements and will use this supply and decide if continuing is feasible.

customer_reviews.title: Great

customer_reviews.title: Giant clump arrived instead of consumable pills
customer_reviews.text: I have no issue with the product when I’m able to take it. My issue is the storage and delivery from amazon. I have these on subscribe and save. The first bottle I received was great the second was terrible. They were all melded together in a giant clump. Returned for a new bottle, new bottle is the same. I’m returning again for a new bottle, but if the third is the same, I’ll be finding a new place to buy them from.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Hard Gell Caps
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with the batch of D3 vitamins I received. The gel caps were extremely hard. I have never encountered this before. I think you need to look into this. I actually will not take the vitamins I received. I believe they could be counterfeit.

customer_reviews.title: Long- term Support
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended this supplement many years ago, and I have found this brand to be one that meets my expectations as far as easy to swallow, no aftertaste, and sustains my confidence that it works.

customer_reviews.title: great suppliment

customer_reviews.title: Best Vitamin D supplements! No after taste and easy to swallow
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking vitamin D for many years due to a deficiency. Natures Bounty is a great brand as their pills are easy to swallow and very small. There is never an after taste and I’ve never had any symptoms from their supplements. This is a great value for the vitamin D pills and so glad they are available as it’s been difficult to find during the pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: Moriko

customer_reviews.title: Count pills
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t bother to count pills which were supposed to be 350 in bottle. I take 2 each morning. Suddenly August 25 2020 I noticed there were only a few left. I went to reorder and saw that the bottle I was using was delivered around July 15 2020 or roughly 40 days earlier. That’s about 80 I have used and I’m almost out. Count pills when you get these.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Drayton

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The bottle was wrapped in plastic and lid had a plastic covering as well as under the lid. Easy to open. I need this as I have low vitamin d

customer_reviews.title: Keep immunity strong.
customer_reviews.text: Inside often due to quarantine so bought this to help get vitamin D when cant get a lot of sunlight. Like it. Also taking zinc. Fights against the Corona virus. Keeps immune system strong. Many of 'Nature's Bounty' products are good! I love their Milk Thistle. Also for strong immune system and healthy liver.
customer_reviews.author: Mary I. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Stuck together
customer_reviews.text: Cannot speak as to the quality of these D3 softgel because they are all stuck together in a big clump. I can only guess that the bottle was in heat for a long period of time. The only way that I can get one out to take is to put a spoon handle inside the bottle and pry one off of the clump. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kat's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: My entire family suffers with chronic fatigue. We have all now been tested and discovered our vitamin D levels are super low. Taking 1 of these a day has helped tremendously. But I have to be strict because if you miss a day your levels can drop again. They dont check vitamin D on standard blood screening so I had to request that it be added. But I was falling asleep enough throughout the day that they had me do a sleep study for apnea and narcolepsy.
customer_reviews.author: shhhhhh6Top Contributor: Pets

product_meta.title: Vitamin D by Nature’s Bounty for immune support. Vitamin D provides immune support and promotes healthy bones. 2000IU, 350 Softgels
product_meta.description: Size: 350 count. A daily dose of Vitamin D3 by Nature’s Bounty is a simple and effective way to show your immune system some love.* That’s because Nature’s Bounty Vitamin D is an essential nutrient for immune support.* By assisting with calcium absorption, Nature’s Bounty Vitamin D3 also helps maintain healthy bones in adults and it provides the benefits of the natural sunshine that living and working indoors can deprive us.* Vitamin D Softgels from the vitamin experts at Nature’s Bounty combine science, nature and 50 years of expertise and innovation to provide the easiest way to increase your daily intake of this important nutrient. When wellness is everything, the vitamin experts at Nature’s Bounty have everything you need to get there. Nature’s Bounty is committed to safety and purity in all our supplements. Our rapid release Vitamin D3 Softgels are non-GMO, gluten- and sugar-free, and contain no artificial colors, or sweeteners.
feature_bullets: Immune support: 350-count, 2000IU Vitamin D3 Softgels for immune health.Vitamin D by Nature’s Bounty may assist the immune system by helping to regulate T and B-lymphocytes. Vitamin D3 is a more potent form of Vitamin D

Strong, healthy bones: In addition to immune support, getting a sufficient amount of Vitamin D is critical to building and maintaining strong bones in adults. It is essential for calcium absorption to help support healthy bones.Nature’s Bounty Vitamin D3 Softgels supplement the Vitamin D your body needs for overall health

Year-round support: Vitamin D3 supplements by Nature’s Bounty contain the same form of Vitamin D that is naturally formed in the body through exposure to sunshine. Nature’s Bounty Vitamin D3 helps replicate the benefits of natural sunshine all year long

Purity is our priority: Nature’s Bounty is committed to safety and purity in all our supplements. Our rapid release Vitamin D3 Softgels are non-GMO, gluten- and sugar-free, and contain no artificial colors, or sweeteners

From the trusted wellness experts: Nature’s Bounty Vitamin D supplements are a product of 50 years of dedication to quality, consistency and scientific research to make vitamins and nutritional supplements of unrivaled excellence

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
